body_html:
I have the same problem. I'm using the Tensorflow 1.0 with GPU on Windows 10. I tried some suggest in other issues, such as remove the special chars in checkpoint name, using absolute path. But still have this problem. Cloud you tell me how to solve this? Thank you.

Some output infomation are as follow:

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
